group_1.textCenter: This can't be how she truly feels! What@does this character truly desire?!
All I want is for her to be true to herself!

group_1.textLeft: Let's stop by the shoppin' center, grab@some chicken skewers, and go home.

group_1.textRight: Perfect choice for an old fart like you.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, here I was going to treat you to@some and you say something like that!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Well, I didn't say I'd turn it down.[chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100901:lipSynch_1] *Gulp*
I wonder what's up with her...

group_1.textLeft: She's been actin' like her head's in the @clouds recently, hasn't she?

group_1.narration: What Alina-senpai said just keeps@echoing in my head, over and over.
My true feelings...
I want to fight all by myself and @bring happiness to everyone.@I want to be like Magical Kirin.
I've wanted that ever since my wish@was granted, it hasn't changed...
The reason I made my wish@was actually my grandma.

group_1.textLeft: This is your daddy's mom. She's your@grandma.

group_1.narration: Before that day, I didn't even@know I had a grandma.
So when I first met her, I didn't know@how to talk to her at all. But then...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's "Phantom Thief Magical Kirin"!@[chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Grandma, you know it too?!

group_1.textRight: I heard you liked it, so I got into it too.

group_1.narration: My grandma's energetic and fun,@so I quickly grew to love her.

group_1.textLeft: The Magical Kirin Halloween story was really@touching this time around...
Gimme something good and I'll trick you!

group_1.textCenter: My trick is that I'll exorcise these demons!

group_1.narration: We had such a great time together reading@manga, it made me love her even more.
But then...

group_1.textRight: Why do I have to live under the same roof@as that thieving cheat of a mother-in-law!

group_1.textLeft: I told you, remember. She came here to@get better!

group_1.textRight: That doesn't change the fact she's stolen@things over and over, does it?!

group_1.narration: Once she learned that Grandma was going to @live with us to recover from her illness...
My mom got mad whenever@I spent time with her.
But from my perspective, I only ever@saw the kind, warm side of Grandma...
So it was way harder for me to see her@upset than to see my mom angry.
That's why I did what I did...

group_1.textLeft: If you spend all this time with me, you@know your mother will get angry.
I wish that Magical Kirin could exorcise  @my illness...
...like she did to the demons that guarded@those artifacts...

group_1.textRight: I'll do it, then...@I'll exorcise it for you!
Trick and treat! Gimme something good@and I'll trick you!
My trick is that I will exorcise those demons@from you!

group_1.narration: I knew there was no way I could@possibly cure my precious grandma.
I just wanted to pretend I was like@Magical Kirin, and could help her out.
And then...

group_1.textRight: Do you really want that to be your wish?

group_1.narration: I'll be an amazing Magical Girl,@just like Magical Kirin!
That was how, on Halloween night,@I made my wish to Kyubey.

group_1.textCenter: (I want to be strong enough to fight alone.)

group_1.textRight: This is the same Witch... The one@I couldn't beat...
